room_title: Escape room "The Office of Dr. Awk C. Abmoor" by Escape Factor Chicago in Chicago
review: I booked the 30-minute room for a friend and I and we loved it! The rooms are challenging but fun and engaging! The employees were very very friendly. I will definitely be back for the hour room!

room_title: Escape room "The Office of Dr. Awk C. Abmoor" by Escape Factor Chicago in Chicago
review: This is so much fun! I've done escape rooms in Los Angeles and Seattle, and had such a good time at Escape Factor. My friend and I took her 12-year-old daughter and did the 30 min room. Not only is the story fun, but there literally is something for everybody. The games within the game are really thoughtful and everybody we interacted with was so helpful. Can't wait to do other rooms that they have!

room_title: Escape room "The Office of Dr. Awk C. Abmoor" by Escape Factor Chicago in Chicago
review: Did a 30 minute escape and it was so fun. Thomas greeted us and he was so professional and welcoming. Very impressed by him and how nice he was. Made us want to go back for that alone. The escape room concept is so clever and I definitely want to go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Office of Dr. Awk C. Abmoor" by Escape Factor Chicago in Chicago
review: Once again, a fantastic experience. This time we did the 30-minute escape room (having already done the 60-minute one) and it did not disappoint. It was extremely well set up, very clever and fun. Our game master (and one of the owners) Dexter was hilarious and helpful. This place is absolutely one of the best escape rooms we've ever been to - highly highly recommend. Our kids are 10 and 12 and thoroughly enjoyed this as well. Can't wait for the game show room to open!

room_title: Escape room "The Office of Dr. Awk C. Abmoor" by Escape Factor Chicago in Chicago
review: The 30 min room was great for our family of 4 who had never done one. The hints were increasing specific, which is great, as you learn how to solve the puzzle, as opposed to wondering why you got stuck.
